author: jstrachan
msg: added support for standard JMS headers being passed along as parameters

author: jta
msg: Updated the web site for the 10.0 docs at http://db.apache.org/derby/docs/10.0:
1) Switched to the skinconf that the main Derby web site uses.
2) Put the Derby hat logo in place.
3) Replaced Incubator logo with info on where to find current docs.
4) Brought the web_site.html up to current reality.

author: dims
msg: - Fix spelling error in method name (getERPforService -> getEPRforService)
- Add a repo for JMS server and JMS client based tests
- All the 4 tests in JMSEchoRawXMLTest are now working.
